sections.title: Overview: Hugging Face vs Hugging Face Spaces
paragraphs: Hugging Face (generative ai) is Open platform for machine learning with model hosting, datasets, and collaborative AI development tools.. It's known for AI, Open Source, Models.

Hugging Face Spaces (ml frameworks) is Platform for hosting machine learning demos and applications with support for Gradio, Streamlit, and other frameworks.. Users choose it for Demo Hosting, Community, Multiple Frameworks.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Hugging Face: Model repository, Dataset hosting, Spaces for demos
Hugging Face Spaces: Demo hosting, Multiple frameworks, Community sharing

verdict: Both Hugging Face and Hugging Face Spaces are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Hugging Face for AI, Hugging Face Spaces for Demo Hosting.
